attributes.action: Stop the dumping of raw sewage into Lough Neagh
attributes.background: Regulate the levels of raw sewage that is currently populating Lough Neagh

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.

In any case, water quality is devolved to the Northern Ireland Assembly. This means that your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Executive and Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you want to raise this issue you could contact your MLA, or raise it with the Northern Ireland Executive.

You can find contact details for your MLAs here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/

You can find contact details for the departments of the Northern Ireland Executive here: https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/contacts/government-departments-in-northern-ireland
